text.autoconfig.renlava.option.primaryRe: Minecraft item which is used as a primary resource in crucible.
Number of "stacks" one item of Primary Resource adds.
To fill a Crucible 4 "stacks" is needed. Default: 1
text.autoconfig.renlava.option.secondary: Minecraft item which is used as a secondary resource in crucible.
Number of "stacks" each item of Secondary Resource adds.
To fill a Crucible 16 "stacks" is needed. Default: 1
text.autoconfig.renlava.option.lavaConve: Modifier which adjusts the chance of converting Obsidian to Lava.
